main event: An airman at Keesler Air Force Base observed an unidentified flying object in the sky on March 7, 1954.
interesting points: The object was bright and round, moving in a northeasterly direction at approximately 500 mph,The airman estimated the object to be 500 feet in altitude,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds before the object disappeared,The object was self-luminous and made no sound,The investigation found no physical evidence or additional witnesses.
sighted object: a bright, round unidentified flying object
witness description: an airman on duty in the area of the base theatre
